name: attachmentLinkDiscord
description: Link an existing Discord message to an issue.

args.name: createAsUser
args.description: Create attachment as a user with the provided name. This option is only available to OAuth applications creating attachments in `actor=app` mode.

args.name: displayIconUrl
args.description: Provide an external user avatar URL. Can only be used in conjunction with the `createAsUser` options. This option is only available to OAuth applications creating comments in `actor=app` mode.

args.name: title
args.description: The title to use for the attachment.

args.name: issueId
args.description: The issue for which to link the Discord message. Can be a UUID or issue identifier (e.g., 'LIN-123').

args.name: id
args.description: Optional attachment ID that may be provided through the API.

args.name: channelId
args.description: The Discord channel ID for the message to link.

args.name: messageId

args.name: url
args.description: The Discord message URL for the message to link.

args.description: [INTERNAL] Mapping of existing team entities to those inherited from the parent team

args.name: redirectUri

name: userChangeRole
description: Changes the role of a user.

args.name: role
args.description: The new role for the user.

args.name: id
args.description: The identifier of the user

name: userDiscordConnect
description: Connects the Discord user to this Linear account via OAuth2.

args.name: redirectUri
args.description: The Discord OAuth redirect URI.

args.name: code
args.description: The Discord OAuth code.

name: userExternalUserDisconnect
description: Disconnects the external user from this Linear account.

args.name: service
args.description: The external service to disconnect.

args.name: operation
args.description: Flag operation to perform.

args.name: flag
args.description: Settings flag to increment.

name: userRevokeAllSessions
description: Revokes a user's sessions. Can only be called by an admin or owner.

args.name: id
args.description: The identifier of the user to logout all sessions of.

name: userRevokeSession
description: Revokes a specific session for a user. Can only be called by an admin or owner.

args.name: sessionId
args.description: The identifier of the session to revoke.

args.name: id
args.description: The identifier of the user whose session to revoke.

args.name: flags
args.description: The flags to reset. If not provided all flags will be reset.

args.name: input
args.description: A partial notification object to update the settings with.

args.name: id
args.description: The identifier of the userSettings to update.

name: userSuspend
description: Suspends a user. Can only be called by an admin or owner.

args.name: forceBypassScimRestrictions
args.description: [INTERNAL] Whether to bypass SCIM restrictions when suspending. Use with caution  this overrides identity provider management.

args.name: id
args.description: The identifier of the user to suspend.

name: userUnlinkFromIdentityProvider
description: Unlinks a guest user from their identity provider. Can only be called by an admin when SCIM is enabled.

args.name: id
args.description: The identifier of the guest user to unlink from their identity provider.

name: userUnsuspend
description: Un-suspends a user. Can only be called by an admin or owner.

args.name: forceBypassScimRestrictions
args.description: [INTERNAL] Whether to bypass SCIM restrictions when unsuspending. Use with caution  this overrides identity provider management.

args.name: id
args.description: The identifier of the user to unsuspend.

name: userUpdate
description: Updates a user. Only available to organization admins and the user themselves.

args.name: input
args.description: A partial user object to update the user with.

args.name: id
args.description: The identifier of the user to update. Use `me` to reference currently authenticated user.

name: workflowStateArchive
description: Archives a state. Only states with issues that have all been archived can be archived.

name: workflowStateCreate
